Title: Chokore Marvel (Navy Blue) Necktie
Description:
"This necktie ain't your average necktie – oh no! With its cool checkered pattern, ""Marvel"" is here to add some serious flair to your look and save you from a fashion rut.
And the best part? ""Marvel"" isn't just about looks – it's got the goods to back it up too. Crafted in Italy, using top-quality materials, you can trust it to keep you looking sharp through all your adventurous days.
100% Seta Silk 
Handcrafted in Italy 
Dry Clean only
The ties are handcrafted in Italy by a renowned fabricator that manufactures for some of the world’s most coveted luxury brands.
"

Title: Chokore Forest Green Colour Pure Silk Pocket Square, from the Solids Line
Description: Nature dominates the colour green. Green is a lively colour symbolising renewal and growth. You can style this plain pocket square with any jacket and it will go. The best combination can be white and light blue here.  Be it a formal meeting or informal dinner, this pocket square won’t disappoint you.
Details:
Rich, pure Satin Silk  pocket square
Pure Silk. 
Size : 13.5 x 13.5 inches.
Suitable for formal wear /casualwear,  evening or brunch with friends
Elegant branded packaging, great for gifting
MRP is inclusive of all taxes.

Description: Rich, pure Satin Silk, printed Pocket square, in two colors, from solid collection. Suitable for formalwear and festivewear. 13.5 inches square. Elegant packaging, for gifting.

Title: Chokore Purrfect Cat Eye Sunglasses with UV 400 Protection (White & Yellow)
Description: Looking for the ultimate accessory to add some feline finesse to your look? Look no further than our purrfectly fabulous cat eye sunglasses! Crafted with top-quality materials, these sunglasses offer both style and functionality. Protect your eyes from harmful rays while adding some cat-titude to your outfit, whether you're out and about or just relaxing in your backyard. Unleash your inner feline with these sunglasses and elevate your look with glamour and sophistication. Perfect for both men and women!
Details:
Superior UV Protection: These sunglasses offer exceptional UV protection with their UV 400 protection, shielding your eyes from harmful UVA and UVB rays and ensuring optimal eye health.

Trendy & Versatile Design: These sunglasses feature a trendy cat-eye design that complements every face shape and will cater to your unique taste.

Enhanced visual comfort: These sunglasses feature polarized lenses that reduce glare from reflective surfaces, such as water, snow, or roads. This technology enhances visual comfort, minimizes eye strain, and improves overall visibility.

Complete Protection Package: These sunglasses come with a protective case and a microfiber cleaning cloth, ensuring that your sunglasses stay safe and clean while on the go.

Premium Lens Quality: Crafted with precision, these sunglasses feature high-quality lenses that provide crystal-clear vision without distortions. The lenses are made with polycarbonate which ensures durability and long-lasting performance.

Size: Size: 14 cm length and 4.5 cm height
MRP is inclusive of all taxes.
